RELEASE NOTES

Itâ€™s 1968 and after years of combat in Vietnam, Lincoln Clay 
knows this truth: family isnâ€™t who youâ€™re born with, itâ€™s who 
you die for. Now back home in New Bordeaux, Lincoln is set 
on escaping a criminal past. But when his surrogate family, 
the black mob, is betrayed and wiped out by the Italian Mafia, 
Lincoln builds a new family on the ashes of the old and blazes 
a path of military-grade revenge through those responsible. 
Intense gun fights, visceral hand-to-hand combat, white 
knuckle driving and street smarts will all be needed. But 
with the right crew, tough decisions and some dirty hands, 
itâ€™s possible to make it to the top of the city's underworld. 

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

Windows 7 64-bit 
Processor: Intel I5-2500K, AMD FX-8120 
Memory: 6 GB RAM 
Graphics: 2GB of Video Memory & NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon HD7870 
Storage: 50 GB available space 
Sound Card: DirectX Compliant Sound card 
Additional Notes: Windows 8.1 users may need additional Windows Update files

FEATURES

* Basis is taken from Steam-content DWORD
* Remove all languages except the English voice / no recoded
* DLC: MAFIA 3 - Family Kick-Back
* Version of the game: 1.0.1.0
* Installation time 35 minutes 
* Xatab Digital Deluxe Edition
* Changing the language in the game menu.

INSTALL NOTES

1. Download the torrent.
3. Install the game Step by Step.
4. Install Redist if needed.
5. Block the game in your firewall 
6. Play through shortcut with admin rights.
7. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy, future updates will be posted on Suprbay in games section.
